abstract: The Boston Seaport, prospective new home of General Electric, is rapidly becoming an “innovation district” for tech companies and biomedical firms.
snippet: The Boston Seaport, prospective new home of General Electric, is rapidly becoming an “innovation district” for tech companies and biomedical firms.
lead_paragraph: BOSTON — When General Electric decided to leave its longtime home in Connecticut and chose the waterfront district here for its new headquarters, it thrust a once-windswept province for fishermen and dock workers into the spotlight.

headline.main: For Boston Seaport, G.E. Was Just a Start
headline.print_headline: For the Boston Seaport, G.E. Was Just a Start
